definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: When they tighten their belts, austerity ripples out and chokes growth.
sentences.chinese: 當他們束緊褲腰帶，簡樸生活會波及到經濟增長。

sentences.english: Superior quality elastic waistband with internal drawstring.
sentences.chinese: 卓越的品質與內部彈性腰帶拉繩。

sentences.english: DNF ancient belt task to do?
Zip and button fastening. Curved waistband with belt loops.
sentences.chinese: 拉鍊和鈕釦固定，腰帶帶有帶環。

sentences.english: My shirt hikes up if I don't wear a belt.
sentences.chinese: 我不束腰帶的話，襯衣就會向上滑。

sentences.english: A broad sash bound her waist.
sentences.chinese: 一根寬腰帶系在她腰上。

sentences.english: We want to buy Knitwear and Knitted Fabrics , Shirts , Belts Suspender , Dress Shirts , Neckwear.
sentences.chinese: 我們要採購針織物和編織織物，襯衫，腰帶。

sentences.english: The black belt is the highest level in karate.
sentences.chinese: 黑腰帶級是空手道的最高級別。

sentences.english: At the same time the belt has a good effect on protecting the waist.
sentences.chinese: 腰帶同時還可以起到一定的護腰的作用。

sentences.english: A set of keys swung from her belt.
sentences.chinese: 她腰帶上掛着的一串鑰匙擺來擺去。

sentences.english: A belt straw and ivy buds.
sentences.chinese: 麥草和長春藤花蕾編的腰帶。
將給我束上鋼鐵的腰帶。

sentences.english: Fess - Military belt or girdle of honor.
sentences.chinese: 軍裝上的腰帶或勳章帶。

sentences.english: She makes linen garments and sells them, and supplies the merchants with sashes .
sentences.chinese: 她做細麻布衣裳出賣，又將腰帶賣與商家。

sentences.english: Belts of grade should not be worn during the bout.
sentences.chinese: 回合賽時不繫段位腰帶。

sentences.english: I drew my coat around me and tightened its belt and as I did so I glanced at Parry's shoes.
sentences.chinese: 我拉緊外套，束緊腰帶，這時，我瞥了一眼帕裏的鞋。

definition: cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
